blogs.title: How to build a simple blog with React and Node.js
blogs.description: In this blog post, we will learn how to build a simple blog application using React for the frontend and Node.js for the backend. We will cover the basics of setting up a RESTful API with Express and connecting it to a MongoDB database.
blogs.author: John Doe

blogs.title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
blogs.description: This blog post dives deep into JavaScript closures, explaining how they work and why they are important. We will also look at practical examples to solidify your understanding.
blogs.author: Jane Smith

blogs.title: A Beginner's Guide to CSS Grid
blogs.description: Learn how to use CSS Grid to create responsive and modern web layouts. This guide covers the basics of CSS Grid and provides examples to help you get started.
blogs.author: Alice Johnson

blogs.title: Top 10 Tips for Writing Clean Code
blogs.description: Writing clean code is essential for maintainable and scalable software. In this blog post, we share 10 tips to help you write cleaner and more efficient code.
blogs.author: Michael Brown
